long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool can help to automatically input your sub-task for your JIRA team work.
・support to [add][delete][review] your task manually
・support multiple task importing in one transaction

*Any question about this tool please contact to its author ,and with pleasure to read feedback:)
